ComicInfo.Summary: In the ultimate showdown to defeat Cardinale and the Darkness army, Royald manages to turn the Witchblade against Medieval Spawn. With the revelation that they used to be lovers, will Katarina be able to prevent the Witchblade from destroying Spawn?
